
                
                <p></p><div class="genxin"><a target="_blank" href="https://u.jd.com/6rJeGRJ">https://u.jd.com/6rJeGRJ</a> 砸落或领券中心有39-10糖果券<br>如有<a href="https://u.jd.com/hzJVdhp" target="_blank" class="infotextkey">黑五200-20券</a><br>炫迈 无糖薄荷糖清香葡萄味22.5g，买2件<a target="_blank" href="https://u.jd.com/6DluX8m">https://u.jd.com/6DluX8m</a><br>炫迈 经典薄荷味糖12g，凑1件<a target="_blank" href="https://u.jd.com/6DJx11L">https://u.jd.com/6DJx11L</a><br>再凑单折后，这个参考5.6<br>例如凑单5件<a target="_blank" href="https://u.jd.com/6Dlz1Ha">https://u.jd.com/6Dlz1Ha</a> <br><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/be684cfagy1hzhgiab9yxj20m80m8qbs.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx1.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/be684cfagy1hzhgiab9yxj20m80m8qbs.jpg" class="qr-image"><img data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx2.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/be684cfagy1hzhgidejjuj20m80m8q9k.jpg" src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=https://wx2.sinaimg.cn/oslarge/be684cfagy1hzhgidejjuj20m80m8q9k.jpg" class="qr-image"></div><p></p>
